name: Mystiqa - Procedural Action-Adventure RPG
description:
Mystiqa is a procedurally generated action-adventure rpg currently in development. It takes its inspiration from beloved classics like Zelda, Secret of Mana or similiar games.

This is a very early demo showing weapons, the overworld generator and some enemies to test out the game.

Feel free to give feedback.

If you want to learn more about the development, check out my twitter profile: https://twitter.com/julcreutz

ARROW KEYS    movement

 F                                  action button

D                                  weapon skill
